content: hat is worked in rounds from top down using groups of double_crochet with chain 1 spaces ribbing is worked using dcfp and dcbp stitches pattern requires bernat® super value™ 7 oz/197 g 426 yds/389 m contrast a navy 07711 1 ball contrast b grass 53223 1 ball contrast c burgundy 07636 1 ball contrast d clay 53041 1 ball contrast e pumpkin 53630 1 ball sizes u s 7 4 5 mm and u s h/8 5 mm crochet hooks or size needed to obtain gauge
